commands

Interface ICommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackupCommand, DefineIndexCommand, DefineTableCommand, DeleteCommand, DropCommand, ExitCommand, InsertCommand, IntersectCommand, JoinCommand, MinusCommand, OrderCommand, PrintCommand, ProjectCommand, ReadCommand, RenameCommand, RestoreCommand, SelectCommand, UnionCommand, UpdateCommand

    public interface ICommand
    An interface for classes representing database commands.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Executes the command.
      boolean matches(java.lang.String input)
      Tests if input is a valid command.

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        boolean matches(java.lang.String input)
        Tests if input is a valid command.
        Parameters:
        input - String which may be a valid command.
        Returns:
        true iff input matches the pattern for the command

      • execute

        void execute()
             throws DatabaseException
        Executes the command.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
